exceptions.tactic: apply locally_not' in H as [d Hd].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y}" on hypothesis of type "filterlim (fun (x : T1) (y : {z : T2 | dom z}) => f x (proj1_sig y)) F1 (locally (fun y : {z : T2 | dom z} => g (proj1_sig y)))".
The reference d was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hd was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hy was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x P H. apply locally_not' in H as [d Hd]. exists d. intros y Hy. apply Hd. apply Hy.
